Overview

GroupsQueryBinder contains methods for accessing groups.

Constant Summary collapse

GROUP_DETAIL_FRAGMENT = 
<<-GRAPHQL
  fragment GroupDetail on Group {
    id
    name
    description
    members {
      totalCount
      edges {
        cursor
        node {
          __typename
          id
          member {
            __typename
            id
          }
        }
      }
    }
    tags {
      totalCount
      edges {
        cursor
        node {
          __typename
          id
          tag
        }
      }
    }
  }
GRAPHQL

def delete(name:, context: {})
  Response.new Client::Groups::DeleteGroupMutation.execute(client: client, name: name, context: context)
end

#update(**kwargs) ⇒ Response

Update a group.

Parameters:

  • context (Hash) —

    Added context to add to the request as headers

  • name (String) —

    The name of the group (exact)

  • description (String) —

    A description of the group.

  • groups (Array<String>) —

    Groups to include in the group. Send EITHER groups or services.

  • services (Array<String>) —

    Services to include in the group. Send EITHER groups or services.

  • tags (Array<String>) —

    Tags associated with the group

Returns:

  • (Response)
